text: Prevents any pawn (be it human, animal, or mechanoid) from having any animations unless they're from player's faction.
Determines maximum zoom level at which the animations will play. If you zoom beyond it, the animations will stop playing.
Disable weapon twirling for weapons over specific mass
Requires walking animations to be enabled as well
Requires all work animations to be anbled as well
Requires combat animations to be enabled as well
